mean_cn: adj.有条件的，假定的；  n.条件句，条件语
mean_en: expressing something that must happen or be true if another thing is to happen or be true; depending on something
sentence: Cats\u0027 love for humans seems to be conditional.
sentence_trans: 看来，猫对人类的爱是有条件的。
word_etyma: condition条件 + al形容词后缀 → conditional条件的，有条件的
